Blog Backbone Information

  • Jekyll: A simple, blog aware, static site generator (used for this site).
  • Mojombo.github.io: Tom Preston-Werner's blog, the theme from which this blog is based on.
  • Prose.io: A clean content editor I use for the blog when I don't feel like writing posts in a text editor.
